Title: A Better Future, Together
Description:
$n, we need to work with Shae'lune and help her perform the purification ritual on Shandris.

Shae'lune says she's only done it on objects before--not people. There is some... risk involved.

But I've come to know Shandris. She'd do the same for me.

Talk to Shae'lune and follow her instructions.
ObjectivesText: Help Shae'lune perform the separation ritual on Shandris.

Objectives.Text: Talk to Shae'lune about the ritual
Ingredients mixed in the bowl of moon water
